page.title: 14EDUCATION
page.content: The Play Group in Sidlesham is for children from 3 to 5 years old.They go on Monday and Thursday mornings.There are about 20 children and 2 helpers. It costs 65p each morning for the children to go there. There has been a play group in Sidlesham for 18 years and in September it is moving from Keynor Hut to Sidlesham School. The old part of Sidlesham School was built as a Board School in 1877. In 1908 another classroom was built on so that it was big enough for 210 children. In 1933 four more classrooms Were built on. Today there are 70 children in the School. There are 4 teachers and 8 other staff.The children mainiy come from Sidlesham and Almodington. When the children are 10 years old they go to Manhood Secondary School.
